pre_event_instructions: Wear business casual attire. Arrive 30 minutes early for setup.
Review volunteer roster and assignments beforehand.
Comfortable clothing and shoes recommended. Outdoor event.
Presentation materials will be provided. 15-minute speaking slot.
Test your microphone and camera before the event. Zoom link sent 24 hours prior.
Coordinate with other leads for smooth transitions between sessions.
Workshop materials provided. Interactive session with Q&A.
Help with setup, refreshments, and activities.
